Text: Could not detect 6 channels, stereo only.
Fantastic picture, but sound is super low.

The video quality is very good but for some reason the sound volume is so low I had to max out the volume on my laptop and receiver (HDMI connected).  It caused my amp to reset 3 times duriing louder passages such as the forest fire.
